author: Fei Wong

text: Well, I think of all of the people who have many fond memories of the classic games, in particular Mega Man 2.  Face it, the series hasn't changed much in twenty years, and not surprisingly this has turned a lot of people away, who have simply become bored of the same thing over and over again--and it's understandable, sure.  But when it comes down to the music, I have nothing but extraordinarily high praise for the Zero series and the ZX series, and I'm just disappointed that it's so unknown.

author: 2Digitalism

text: I completely disagree--have you actually played today's Mega Man games?  And why was my comment marked down?  I was only talking about the music anyway.  You know, I'm sick of this.  I think it's absolutely ridiculous that across the internet everyone seems to feel that the music in  Mega Man 2 was amazing and that no current Mega Man game can hold a candle to it, and yet very few of these people have even played current-day Mega Man games.
